courses.title: Full Spectrum Operator Course
courses.description: Full Spectrum Operator Course represents the pinnacle of tactical training, combining multiple disciplines into comprehensive operational preparation. This advanced program integrates firearms, tactics, medical, and decision-making skills for experienced personnel operating in various threat environments. Students develop adaptability and mission-focused thinking.

courses.title: Protective Emergency Casualty Care
courses.description: Protective Emergency Casualty Care provides critical medical training specifically designed for protection agents and security professionals. Students learn trauma response, emergency medical procedures, and life-saving techniques that may be needed during security operations. This training can mean the difference between life and death. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Protective Emergency Casualty Care
courses.description: Protective Emergency Casualty Care provides critical medical training specifically designed for protection agents and security professionals. Students learn trauma response, emergency medical procedures, and life-saving techniques that may be needed during security operations. This training can mean the difference between life and death. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Protective Agent Develpoment
courses.description: Protection Agent Development offers comprehensive training in contemporary personal security operations. This course creates a foundation for current and prospective protection agents through academic instruction and practical exercises. Students learn threat assessment, advance work, and low-visibility protective techniques.

courses.title: Protectve Operations Supervisor Training
courses.description: Protective Operations Supervisor Training prepares experienced agents for leadership roles in protective services. This specialized course covers team management, operational planning, coordination techniques, and supervisory responsibilities specific to protection operations.

courses.title: NV Armed Security Officer Certification
courses.description: Nevada Armed Security Officer Certification exceeds state requirements with comprehensive 16-hour training. This certification covers advanced firearms handling, legal responsibilities, use of force decision-making, and professional conduct standards for armed security personnel. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Residential Security Operations Certification
courses.description: Residential Security Operations Certification provides specialized training for estate and high-net-worth residential security. This comprehensive course covers property protection strategies, client relations, emergency procedures, and the unique challenges of residential security operations. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Protective Security Operations Certification
courses.description: Protective Security Operations Certification is designed exclusively for private security, Federal Government, DoD, and law enforcement professionals. This intensive 5-day certification program teaches contemporary skills for low visibility personal security operations in permissive to semi-permissive environments. Students learn advanced threat assessment, situational awareness, and protective methodologies used by professional agents worldwide. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Protective Emergency Casualty Care
courses.description: Protective Emergency Casualty Care provides critical medical training specifically designed for protection agents and security professionals. Students learn trauma response, emergency medical procedures, and life-saving techniques that may be needed during security operations. This training can mean the difference between life and death. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Protective Driving Operations Certification
courses.description: Protective Driving Operations Certification covers advanced driving techniques for security professionals. Emergency vehicle operations, evasive maneuvers, and tactical driving for protective details. This comprehensive program represents a significant professional development investment. *PFC Safeguards branding required for marketing compliance.

courses.title: Trauma Immediate Responder
courses.description: Trauma Immediate Response delivers essential emergency medical training for tactical and security personnel. Students learn critical first aid skills, trauma care techniques, and emergency response procedures that could save lives in crisis situations.

courses.title: Covert Operations Protective Surveillance
courses.description: Covert Operations & Protective Surveillance provides advanced surveillance training for protection professionals. Students learn covert observation techniques, surveillance detection, and counter-surveillance methods essential for executive protection. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: Progressive Protection Training
courses.description: Progressive Protection Training 1 focuses on executive protection foundations. This specialized course covers the fundamentals of protective services, threat assessment, and basic protective methodologies.

courses.title: Progressive Protection Training 2
courses.description: Progressive Protection Training 2 advances executive protection skills with complex scenarios and advanced techniques. Students learn sophisticated protective methods and advanced operational planning.

courses.title: Combative Concealed Handgun
courses.description: Combative Concealed Handgun teaches advanced skills for carrying and deploying handguns from concealment. Students learn proper wardrobe selection, holster systems, legal considerations, and dynamic deployment techniques. Essential training for anyone carrying concealed weapons professionally or personally.
